case.state: HK416. Please remember this extraord-- G28?! What are you...

HK416. Please remember this extraordinary name.
...Hm? I wasn't expecting to see you here, Sei.

HK416. Please remember this extraordinary name.
...Hm? Another T-Doll, I see... PA-15, was it?
HK416. Please remember this extraordinary name.
G28?! What are you doing...
Oh? I wasn't expecting to see you here, Sei...

I see I'm not the only T-Doll to have found this place...
So... your name is PA-15, is it?

My apologies. I must've mistaken you for my sister... It's not as if 45 would go out of her way to lock me into a simulation with her, right?
(...Shit, she could hear that, couldn't she?)
45? ...45, I know you can fucking hear me. What kind of-- what the hell? Are those crystals?
Really, another maniac with a rocket launcher? I was hoping that Architect would be the last one I'd have to deal with...
So I suppose UMP45 wants this to be a joint simulation, then... very well.
45? ...45, I know you can fucking hear me. What kind of simulation did you drop me into?
45? ...45, I know you can fucking hear me. What kind of simulation is this?
45? ...45, I know you can hear me, damnit. What fucking kind of simulation is this?
Hm.
Right...
This works.
This will be a smooth operation, I expect.
This round will go smoothly, as I suspected.
...works for me.
Proceeding as planned.
Operation proceeding without a hitch.
Everything working as intended, I see...
Finally. Something that works for me.
Finally. The engagement parameters are decent, this time.
The engagement is actually to my advantage, this time...?
This should go smoothly. For once.
Good, good...
Some good luck, for once...
This works, this works...
Finally. Some decent cards.
I feel a little less inclined to shoot the dealer. This time.
This works. For once.
Hmph. So where is this, anyways? It clearly isn't Sangvis territory.
So where exactly is this... 'Inventory' located, in any case? We clearly are not in Sangvis territory.
Who in their right mind would make this a training exercise, anyways?
I wonder what kind of braindamaged pervert would go through all the effort of making a training simulation... with strip poker.
I wonder how and where UMP45 even got the data for a simulation like this...
Where did UMP45 even find the files for a simulation like this...?
I should clean my rifle when I'm done here...
404's next contract was with... Wait. Nevermind that.
I wonder where my Dummy Links are.
Hmm... What now...?
This hand... isn't perfect, but at least it's not shit.
...It'll have to do.
I suppose I'll have to make do. At least it's not shit.
It's good enough, I suppose.
...It'll have to work, I guess.
Hmph... how could this happen? I was supposed to be the best...
How could I let this happen? I was meant to be the best...
Ugh... how disgraceful. How could I let this happen to myself?
Okay... I must not lose composure.
I just... need to keep cool.
Okay... I can't lose composure, now...
...I need to keep composed, especially now.
This... has not gone according to plan.
Scheiße.
This may require some tactical reconsideration.
Too late to perform a tactical withdrawal...
This has turned into a difficult situation.
This... will be difficult.
This won't end well.
This isn't going to work...
Dealer... I am going to shoot you.
...I am going to shoot you when this is over, Dealer.
It is taking me every ounce of self-restraint I have to not shoot the dealer in the face.
Verdammt!
...Well.
Ach, scheiße...
Scheiße!
Dealer. I may not fully armed or clothed at the moment... but I can exert a maximum grip force of up to two hundred Newtons. I urge you to be careful, ja?
Dealer... I may not be armed, but I assure you, I can still kill you with my hands. Or legs.
Dealer... I can kill you in over a dozen ways with my legs alone. Do not test me.
Arschloch!
I'm aware the last time I drank was troublesome, but if you're serious about this, Sei... I suppose a Beer wouldn't hurt-- No, on second thought, make that a Cobalt Velvet...

Regardless, I am HK416... and I will not settle for anything less than victory.
Please remember this extraordinary name.
Come to think of it, though... Which Sei am I speaking to, right now? The T-Doll, or the human?
So, Rin... what brings you here in the first place? I didn't think this place would be especially popular with students... though I suppose I'm clearly mistaken.
So, Rin... what brings you here in the first place? This place doesn't seem to be especially popular with students.

Hmph... this should be trivial to complete, in any case.
...Strange, my audio receptors must be malfunctioning-- they're trying to attribute speech to that butterfly.
Hmph. Regardless... I am HK416. Please remember this... extraordinary name.
Hmph... this should be trivial to complete. In any case, I am HK416. Please... remember this extraordinary name.
Hmph...this simulation appears to be trivial in any case. Regardless... I am HK416. Please, remember this extraordinary name.
...I won't have anything, Sei. Things got... troublesome the last time I drank, to say the least.
Fujisaki must be truly talented, then, if she can construct an AI that can run on such a constrained platform.
A true AI, running on such a constrained platform... your creator must be truly talented, Alter Ego. I know a few firms that could use her skills.
Hm. So, is 'Sakura' your real name, then?
These sensor readings don't seem to align properly with ~sakura~... she seems more like an ELID infectee than a regular human...
Mein Gott, why does every engineer I meet turn out to be eccentric at best?

You, there. The idiot with the ridiculous hair.
What is that device on your arm, and why did you bring it here?
So... N, was it? It's perhaps a bit hypocritical for me to say this, but you have a fairly unusual name. Why is that?
I'm only offering this because of our similar backgrounds, okay? It's... nice to know someone relatable, here.
So this, erm, 'Fidget'... is she some form of experimental drone or hologram? I wasn't aware that Technical Fairies could be that small.
Wait, that voice-- is it coming from the sword?!

(God, listening to this woman go on is insufferable...)
Don't you have anything better to do than go on about your fantasies, Miss... Tharja?
No, that's utterly stupid... why would IOP design our clothes to be easily damaged like that? But, then again, the way it falls apart is improbable, so...
...I suppose I'll have to be the one to ask: who invited ~tagged~? Did no-one notice how... well, mentally unsound ~tagged.ifmale(he|she)~ is?

condition.saying: you must find the alien woman pretty scary

case.state: According to my sensor analysis, Jura, you are a standard flesh-and-blood human wearing a remarkably unarmored dress. Even without my dummy links, I would have no trouble facing off against you.
HK416 is my official unit designation. As far as I am concerned, that is the only name I need.

condition.saying: too stoic for your own good

case.state: HK416 is my official unit designation as a T-Doll, and I have no need for any others.

condition.saying: what kind of woman just gives "HK416" for her name

case.state: I am a T-Doll, built to be a top-of-the-line tactical operator and soldier. HK416 is my unit designation, and that is the only name I need.

condition.saying: you must find the alien woman pretty scary

case.state: According to my sensor analysis, Jura, you are a standard flesh-and-blood human, with no protective equipment or armor to speak of. Even without my dummy links, I would have no trouble facing off against you.

On the contrary, Meia, I was specifically designed for tactical combat operations. I would be suboptimal as a pilot... and as loathe as I am to admit it, T-Dolls like UMP45 are better suited for the intelligence and command role than I.
Dismissing kinetic firearms so quickly seems rather shortsighted, Meia. They are simple, cheap, and reliable-- what more could you ask for from a weapon?

I've fought against targets wielding energy weaponry before. Between the fragility of the weapons themselves and the upkeep costs, I have to wonder why anyone bothers with them. Furthermore, my commanding officer is a woman.
I was designed and built to be an expert with a variety of firearms, though I'm sure I could adapt to piloting air- and spacecraft with ease, if an assignment called for it.
Yes, I was designed and built to be an expert on kinetic firearms, among other things. You could almost say they define who I am.

condition.saying: Are we calling each other by our pieces now
to name herself after her own gun

case.state: The HK416 is just the weapon I was designed to be most capable with, which is why it's my unit designation. And no, even if I had it with me, I would not just hand it over to you.

condition.saying: I didn't know they got up to 416
I never heard a' that model

case.state: Hm, you've never heard of the HK416 assault rifle? It entered service a long time ago-- back in 2004, I believe? And even if I had access to it in this simulation, why would I give it to you?

condition.saying: we can do that the business way or the hard way

case.state: Annoyingly enough, I don't appear to have access to my weapon within this simulation, and I wouldn't just hand it over to someone like you, anyways. I can tell you're a regular, flesh-and-blood human; do you think you can match IOP's finest combat gynoid?
Admittedly, in another time, I absolutely would've refused to participate in this asinine exercise...
"Tsukumogami"...? I am not quite familiar with that word. Nonetheless, my official unit designation is HK416, since that is the weapon I was designed to be most adept with.
Yes, I am a Tactical Doll, which I suppose could be considered similar to a Lilim. Why do you ask?
Hm? Me?
I see how it is... a heavy assault from the very beginning, hm?
Only a minor setback.
I still retain the tactical advantage in this scenario.
If I must.
No operation goes absolutely perfectly, even for me.
Very well, then.
...Nonetheless, I still have the upper hand in this engagement.
I still have the upper hand in this engagement.
My tactical options are rapidly dwindling...
This... is rapidly becoming a major issue.
This is going to be... really problematic.
This will be a major problem.
This situation is very rapidly turning against me...
This really is not good.
This... is actually a real problem.
...if any of you say a word, I will find my knife again and gut you with it.
Don't. Say. Anything.
One word, and I will find my knife and gut you like a fish. Is that clear?
I swear, if I find any pictures of this later, I am going to rip the cores out of each and every one of UMP45's bodies...
Not. A. Word. Clear?
If you say anything, you are going to wish I shot you.
One word, and I will make you beg for a bullet to the head.
Are you fucking serious?
Is this really happening...?
Only a fool would expect any operation to go absolutely according to plan...
No plan survives first contact with the enemy, I see...
...Fine. If I have to.
Perhaps I should reconsider my options, here...
This loss is trivial. For now.
Hmm... must I really?
Well... fine.
Fine, then.
My tactical options are rapidly dwindling...
This... is rapidly becoming a major issue.
This is going to be... really problematic.
This will be a major problem.
This situation is very rapidly turning against me...
This really is not good.
This... is actually a real problem.
...if any of you say a word, I will find my knife again and gut you with it.
Don't. Say. Anything.
One word, and I will find my knife and gut you like a fish. Is that clear?
I swear, if I find any pictures of this later, I am going to rip the cores out of each and every one of UMP45's bodies...
Not. A. Word. Clear?
If you say anything, you are going to wish I shot you.
One word, and I will make you beg for a bullet to the head.
Are you fucking serious?
Is this really happening...?
This is not working.
Clearly, I need to re-analyze the tactical situation.
Damn it.
Running built-in self-tests now...
Perhaps a tactical re-analysis is called for.
Re-evaluating future action space...
How could I have allowed this to happen...
My tactical options are rapidly dwindling...
This... is rapidly becoming a major issue.
This is going to be... really problematic.
This will be a major problem.
This situation is very rapidly turning against me...
This really is not good.
This... is actually a real problem.
...if any of you say a word, I will find my knife again and gut you with it.
Don't. Say. Anything.
One word, and I will find my knife and gut you like a fish. Is that clear?
I swear, if I find any pictures of this later, I am going to rip the cores out of each and every one of UMP45's bodies...
Not. A. Word. Clear?
If you say anything, you are going to wish I shot you.
One word, and I will make you beg for a bullet to the head.
Are you fucking serious?
Is this really happening...?
...but, for now, I'll trust that my commanding officer has a good reason for making me do this.
I see no issue with my name. HK416 is a perfectly usable designation for both my rifle and myself.
Conferring prestige or nobility onto a weapon sounds pointless. It's nothing more than a tool of the trade: all it should require is maintenance and a well-trained operator, not frivolous decoration.
No, I do not know anyone by the name 'Homura'... and even if I did, I of course would never divulge the identities of my clients.

Yes, I've been there before. It was a pleasant place, I suppose. Well, and then I... uhm, nevermind.
It was pleasant. Let's just leave it at that.
Admittedly, there are many parts of my uniform design that I don't understand, either. I assume someone at IOP was thinking with their head, instead of their brain.
'Holly'? Sounds childish... though it does roll off the tongue better than my weapon designation. And it is far better than 'Hek', to be sure.
Hmph... I suppose this situation calls for some loosening up. Getting too worked up over something like this would be... unbecoming of me.
I don't... what, exactly, are you implying?
I-I am not! This is just embarrassing and demeaning... and stop giving me that look, Sei!
The skirt is an inconvenience at times. People who try to look up my skirt during combat operations typically don't live for very long, though.
Very well. You'll find that I have a defense in depth prepared... and I do not intend to lose.
I suppose I should relinquish my beret first.
I'm willing to part with my beret first.
I'm going to surrender my hat. And hopefully, nothing more.
I can part with my beret, if I have to.
Fine... the shoes, next.
Sigh... I suppose my shoes should come next.
...fine. Shoes next.
...The gloves, then.
The gloves come next.
Hmph... gloves next.
Damn it... Fine. I'll take off the jacket.
Ach, to hell with it. I'll take off the jacket.
...I'll strip the jacket. To hell with this.
I'll... take off my jacket, then, fine. I didn't need it anyways.
...I don't have any other option but to lose my skirt now, I see... Damn it.
I guess I have to remove my skirt, this time... shit.
...No other option but to lose the skirt. Damn it.
...bra. Bra next.
Um... the bra, the bra next...
Tch... fine...
Critical damage sustained...
This is it....
Well, this is it...
UMP45 was... perhaps the last person I expected to serve under. Nonetheless... I admit, she's proven herself to be extremely reliable in command and in combat.
No, my standard uniform design does not include much underneath the jacket... why it was designed that way, I will never understand.
Good call. And no, I do not know why I was designed to wear nothing beneath the jacket.
Yes... I'll admit, I'm rather fond of that beret.
Why would I want my bullets to be easily visible? That would make my position obvious, and make it easier for my targets to avoid my fire.
The only one who will need saving is UMP45, once I get out of this simulation.
I'm a consummate professional; I take pride in being 'all business'... even if UMP45 makes this extremely difficult at times.
On the other hand, I have been calibrated and optimized with this exact uniform in mind, so I'm stuck with it, for better or worse.
Yes, I was built with the utmost precision and engineering quality... do you like what you see?
I do not exactly have time for fun, Sei. ...I have been learning to cook, though, during my downtime between assignments.
Tch... I don't need your commentary...
In truth, I'm not sure who designed my uniform... though after this, I believe I might have to pay them a visit. This is beyond ridiculous.
O-Of course I am, I'm the pinnacle of IOP T-Doll design... and I'm glad you recognize that.
And what is that supposed to mean, Sei?!
I used to have unit and manufacturer information etched into my pelvic region... though I had it removed some time ago. It's not as if I need it anymore.
Knowing that someone like ~tagged~ is watching makes this even more humiliating... I swear, I'm going to kill UMP45 when I get out of here...
I'm still just as combat-effective without my hat.
A minor inconvenience.
Merely a minor inconvenience.
I've fought with bare feet before.
Surprisingly enough, barefoot combat is not new to me.
Believe it or not, I've trained for combat in clothing situations like this. Clothing gets damaged on the battlefield surprisingly easily.
Damn it... this could end badly.
Damn it... this is starting to go terribly.
Verdammt..., I really do not have many options left.
Scheiße...
Well...
Well, I fucking did it...
Erm...
...how disgraceful.
...I wish I didn't have to be seen like this...
Situation critical.
...this is really going badly.
This... was a lot more difficult than I anticipated.
...no going back now.
...no chances left.
...no options left.
I prevail, as always.
Another victory to my name.
Operation proceeding as expected.
All according to plan.
Everything proceeding as expected.
As expected of the finest.
I prevail, as expected.
What did you expect when trying to compete with IOP's finest?
And that is what happens when you go against IOP's finest work.
One more victim of IOP's finest.
Aha! Victory.
Got you.
I got you this time...
Victorious again.
I win again.
Assault successful.
Your luck ends here.
Attack successful.
Unlucky as well, hm?
Unlucky...
Rotten luck too, huh...
You too, hm..
Oh...? Losing on the very first round of the game? Are you even trying, PA-15?

Oh? How careless of you, PA-15.
If you're just going to keep being this foolish, then don't bother wasting my time here.
As expected, overcoming this... tactical setback was just a matter of patience and planning.
I'm... certainly operating at a significant tactical disadvantage, but... I just need to hold on...

(I. Won't. Say. Anything. I refuse to give her that satisfaction...)
...Hmph.
Oh, so you've returned.
Oh, so you've come back... I wasn't expecting you to have stripped in the meantime, I'll admit.
...I can already tell this girl will get on my nerves.

...I should not have snapped at you earlier, Hanako. That was unprofessional of me.
...You just remind me of a certain someone.
Listening to this girl is going to be incredibly annoying, I see...

...My outburst earlier was unprofessional and uncalled for. My apologies, Saki.
I just... happen to know someone who was a lot like you.

(She really is like G28... so cheery and energetic.)
So... your name was Akko, correct?

(Ugh. She reminds me of M16... always reeking of booze...)
Would it kill you to take this even slightly more seriously, Syrenne?

Mein Gott, how delusional is this girl? She sounds like a Sangvis Ringleader.
Minus the particle beams and explosions... hopefully.
Hmm... Tomoko, you quite remind me of a certain shotgun-wielding T-Doll-- erm, colleague of mine. In a sense.
This might sound strange, but what are your opinions on lollipops and tactical ballistic shielding?
...wait, the butterfly is a player? Are you trying to mock me?
Nothing good can come of this, I'm sure...
...You know, Tomoko, I had a... a colleague who told me something interesting.
So... what exactly brings you here, of all places? You don't exactly look like the kind to get out often... or at all, really.
I prevail, as always.
Another victory to my name.
Operation proceeding as expected.
All according to plan.
Everything proceeding as expected.
As expected of the finest.
I prevail, as expected.
What did you expect when trying to compete with IOP's finest?
And that is what happens when you go against IOP's finest work.
One more victim of IOP's finest.
Aha! Victory.
Got you.
I got you this time...
Victorious again.
I win again.
Assault successful.
Your luck ends here.
Attack successful.
Unlucky as well, hm?
Unlucky...
Rotten luck too, huh...
You too, hm..
You're seriously taking that off now?
You have some seriously messed up priorities, ~name~.
That's... an odd way of going about things, ~name~.
You didn't take that off sooner?
I'm surprised you didn't take that off sooner.
Wait... what?
...what?
Wait... seriously?
I suppose no battle is won in a single stroke.
No effect on target...
Tch. A grazing shot.
Tch.
How dull.
Is that all?
Trifling.
A mere trinket?
Only that?
How small.
Is that so.
Tch. Coward.
You dirty coward.
Are you really going to hide behind your accessories like that?
Really? You're going to hide behind your accessories like that?
Really?
Damned coward.
Damn you.
Really...?
This was a complete and total defeat...
Hmph...
Your choice, I suppose.
Your loss.
Well, whatever. You do as you will.
Well... you do you, I suppose.
Well, it's your decision.
You... didn't take that off sooner?
Why not sooner...?
You have some weird priorities.
We still have a long ways to go, I see.
It seems the road to victory is longer than I anticipated.
It seems attaining victory will take longer than I expected.
There's still a long way to go, it seems.
This engagement will take longer than expected.
This... will take longer than anticipated, it seems.
Are you planning on turning this into a war of attrition?
Must this really become a battle of attrition?
Still... how disappointing.
A sound tactic, if a bit disappointing.
I suppose it's a safe strategy... if a disappointing one.
Fine, then. I'll show you what happens to those that underestimate me.
Fine, then. It never ends well for those who underestimate me, though.
Don't fucking underestimate me. I can still win this.
If you're underestimating me... you have another thing coming.
To hell with you and your accessories.
You and all your little accessories can go to hell.
Go to hell.
I can't even do anything like this...
Are you serious...
Argh.
Oh! That was... certainly spectactular. How did you do that? Special effects of some kind...?

...!
Shit, is that supposed to be happening?!

It seems counterproductive to wear a tie, especially if you have no hands to tie it with. Even if it didn't make it difficult for you to dress and undress, wouldn't it just get in the way of your art?
Listen: if you're going to be this hesitant, then why are you even here?
Her name was M4A1. She was a lot like you: timid, nervous, wishy-washy... and as such our world broke her.
Stop hesitating and get going already!
Her name was M4A1. She was always really nervous, and hesitated at every turn... and eventually, she shattered under that strain.
Are those gloves your primary weapon? They seem impractical, to say the least... so how do you use them?

Rin. This is no place to sleep... Rin.
Are you kidding me...
You're seriously taking that off now?
You have some seriously messed up priorities, ~name~.
That's... an odd way of going about things, ~name~.
You didn't take that off sooner?
I'm surprised you didn't take that off sooner.
Wait... what?
...what?
Wait... seriously?
I suppose no battle is won in a single stroke.
No effect on target...
Tch. A grazing shot.
Tch.
How dull.
Is that all?
Trifling.
A mere trinket?
Only that?

Is that so.
Tch. Coward.
You dirty coward.
Are you really going to hide behind your accessories like that?
Really? You're going to hide behind your accessories like that?
Really?
Damned coward.
Damn you.
Really...?
This was a complete and total defeat...
Hmph...
Regardless of how you did it... it was still impressive. Certainly must've taken some practice, if you can do it on a whim like that...

...Well, whatever you were intending to do there, you clearly fucked it up.
I suppose you really are like G28, then...
Though I suppose it's none of my concern... I can't tell you how to live your life.
Speak up, for god's sake!
Though I doubt your situation is as dire as hers, I'd hate for you to fall into that same trap all the same, Hanako.
We don't have time to wait for you while you stammer and stumble, Saki!

I... I just wouldn't want you to become like her, Saki.
(I get the feeling that terrible things will happen if I leave her alone...)
Come to think of it, I remember seeing something strange happening with your shoulders and arms before... perhaps that makes everything more practical, somehow...?

Are you seriously sleeping like this?
I stand corrected... you really are a brainlet. Just don't fall over, I don't want to have to pick you up off the floor.
Your choice, I suppose.
Your loss.
Well, whatever. You do as you will.
Well... you do you, I suppose.
Well, it's your decision.
You... didn't take that off sooner?
Why not sooner...?
You have some weird priorities.
We still have a long ways to go, I see.

It seems attaining victory will take longer than I expected.

Still... how disappointing.

Fine, then. It never ends well for those who underestimate me, though.
Don't fucking underestimate me. I can still win this.
If you're underestimating me... you have another thing coming.
To hell with you and your accessories.
You and all your little accessories can fucking go to hell.
Go to hell.
I can't even do anything like this...
Are you serious...
Argh.
I wonder why UMP45 hasn't responded yet. Is that part of the simulation parameters?
No response from UMP45 yet. Is that part of the simulation?
No reply message from UMP45 so far... is that a simulation requirement?
Hmm... I need to check in for routine maintenance at Safehouse Bravo-Charlie in... about four days...
Now that I think about it... this simulation feels a bit different from the regular combat sims.
I wish I could've brought my weapon into this simulation.
Scheduling routine maintenance check at... Safehouse Juliet-Tango in... let's say... 3 days.
I wonder what's happening in Sector S09. The G&K commander there didn't seem half-bad.
I wonder how Sector S09's commander is doing.
I wonder where that commander from Sector S09 is now.
...why am I thinking of the Sector S09 commander now?
...why did I suddenly start thinking of the Commander?
I wonder what UMP45 would do, here.
Heh. I wonder what G11 would do in this situation. ...She'd probably sleep though it.
I kinda wonder how UMP9 would act in this simulation.
I wonder if UMP45 is watching this.
I wonder if my squadmates can see this.
I wonder what my squadmates are doing...
...why am I thinking of the Commander?
Commander...? Why am I thinking of him now...?
Am I seriously thinking of the Commander now...?
I can't get UMP45's smug face out of my head...
UMP45's probably watching this and laughing...
45's probably laughing her ass off right now...
This is humiliating...
Hm. Oh well.
No matter.
In any case...
...Nevermind.
Well, whatever...
...nevermind that.
...well, nevermind that.
...oh well, I suppose.
Hm. I guess it doesn't matter at the moment.
...but I guess that doesn't matter right now.
I suppose that doesn't really matter right now, though.
Perhaps that's not important right now, though.
That's not really relevant right now, though.
That's not important at the moment, though.
...ugh.
...and, great. The game's stalled, hasn't it?
And... perfect. Even the game's stalled, hm?
...and this game needs to hurry up, I swear...
...is this really happening to me?
I don't want to be seen like this...

Do you require assistance?
No? Very well, then...
I wonder why UMP45 hasn't responded yet. Is that part of the simulation parameters?
No response from UMP45, yet. Is that part of the simulation?
No reply message from UMP45 so far... is that a simulation requirement?
Hmm... I need to check in for routine maintenance at Safehouse Bravo-Charlie in... about four days...

I wish I could've brought my weapon into this simulation.

I wonder how Sector S09's commander is doing.

Hm. There's maybe not quite as much muscle there as some of the human mercenaries I've worked alongside, but you're still comparable.
I've seen some human mercenaries with more muscle, I suppose... but you're still pretty muscular nonetheless.

Not particularly impressive, I suppose.

You look... average. At best.

Hm. Not bad, I suppose.
Gut, ja?
Hm.
You certainly have odd priorities, don't you?
You have some strange priorities, ~name~.
That's an... odd way of going about things, ~name~.
Well, I can't say I did not expect this...
Well... this was to be expected, was it not...?
Well, I suppose we all expected something like this...
Well... I guess we all expected this.
Hm... it's hard to feel smug when I'm in the same position as you...
How... disgraceful.
How... improper.
I... hm.
...this is definitely not a situation I was expecting to be in.
...this is definitely not a situation I've ever encountered in my line of work.
I... can't say I've ever encountered a situation like this before.
Are you excited, ~name~?
So ~name~'s going to "whip it out"... I see.
Curious...
Oh. Well, I certainly... miscalculated... during my initial appraisal, then...
Is that so? My initial appraisal of you was certainly... miscalculated, then.
How small.
Miniscule.
What a disappointment.

That's... smaller than I expected.
On the small side...?

That's it...?
Is that all?
...meh. Merely average.
It's not spectacular, but I suppose it is there, at least.
Eh.

How... novel.

It's... hard to stay professional with that on display.
Well... it's certainly out there now.

Interesting.

I wonder how your body compares to mine. Then again, I was designed to excel in every way...

I won't stare if you don't.
You don't stare, I don't stare. Got it?
Right. Can we get moving?
...Rin, was it? You remind me of a certain someone. Though hopefully you're not as much of a brainlet as she is...
...Excuse me? The power of what, precisely?

Hmm. So much for all that bluster from earlier.
I suppose none of that bluster and anger could save you, in the end...
You're just going to accept defeat like this? Disappointing.
Hmm? Walking into a situation blindly is a major tactical error... how did you not know beforehand what this game was, N?

You know, I don't think I've ever encountered any male T-Dolls before. What was your primary weapon, again?

You seem quite underdressed for this scenario... even with that bag of yours.
You seem experienced with firearms. Perhaps we should compare weapons some day?
You seem experienced with firearms. What is your weapon of choice like?
You brought a sword to a gunfight? That seems... unwise.
Hm... you brought a sword to a gunfight?
A sword to a gunfight... that seems unwise.
You seem oddly... detached form this simulation.
For some reason, you seem strangely detached from this sim.
...a yo-yo. That's all you're taking off. A yo-yo.
That's it? That's all you're taking off? A yo-yo? Surely you jest.
A fellow professional... target prioritized.
A fellow professional, hm?
You may seem the fool, Misato... but something in your eyes reminds me of the other T-Dolls.
Hm... you remind me of M16.
The simulation feels a bit... unstable. I wonder why...
This simulation feels a bit... glitchy. I wonder...
Super-Shorty...? Did you dye your hair?
Hm... did you dye your hair, Super-Shorty?
Hm... wings? You wouldn't happen to be capable of flight, would you?
I can't recognize what human religion you're supposed to be from, Pit. Though, admittedly, not many of them survived the War.
...target prioritization, confirmed.
Priority target identified.
Priority target marked.
What the hell? Who is this girl?
Wait, what? Where did she come from...?
You wouldn't happen to know a certain Sten Mk. II, would you? ...Just a passing resemblance, is all.
You remind me of someone... you wouldn't happen to know Sten, would you?
The atmosphere around you seems... off, but I can't put my finger on it.
Something is... off about the atmosphere around you, but I can't put my finger on why...
I thought I heard the sound of... artillery guns firing? It seems Shimakaze has answered that question, however.
That's an odd way to refer to your clothing. And the name... are you some form of T-Doll?
It seems strangely fitting that your mobility systems were the first to go.
Communications this time? I hope she has backups... and I hope my VHF subsystem still works.
Were I in your shoes, Shimakaze... I would begin reconsidering my operational plan and tactics.
Well, if you're still committed to fighting on... I'm not stopping you. You're the one getting repairs, not me.
Your clothing is really getting shredded in this engagement, isn't it. I'm... pretty familiar with that, I'll admit.
I'm surprised Shimakaze's held on for this long.
That uniform seems to offer very little in the way of armor. Or protection in general.
No armor plating, no exoskeleton... how do you deal with gunfire at all?

And no, I will not give you the satisfaction of... betraying my professionalism.
(It's a shame there isn't more to look at yet, though... W-Wait, what am I thinking?)
...I'm not sure why, but I feel like I should never, ever allow you and Architect to come into contact with each other.
Though to your credit, you look less like a drug addict than AA-12.
Ah, I have no particular reason for asking-- it's just something that came to mind.
Ach, damn, my eyes-- Wait. Who is this woman, and where did she come from?
What in the world is-- Scheiße!
She told me that you don't get to choose your friends based on their good qualities.
...Well, the reasons don't really matter. Just stay out of my way.
So, who are you, exactly? You look like you belong at some kind of formal ball. Not here, playing strip poker.
'Amy', hm...? Are you sure you should be here? You look like you belong... elsewhere.
Hmph. Are you even paying attention to anything?
Scheiße! Are you insane?!
So... I understand you are some sort of 'holy' woman, Miss L'Arachel? I find that hard to believe, since you're here, of all places.
So, that really is a... fucking magic staff, huh? I thought it looked odd on thermal.
So... a priestess and a princess? What kind of country do you come from? I thought all of the theocracies collapsed after the Third World War.

So, even someone like you thinks we're nothing but... Eh?
Is that so...?
What kind of armor is that? It's certainly not any kind I'm familiar with.
Body armor, hm? I almost didn't recognize it.
I almost didn't recognize that as armor. How well does it function?
Belts. Surprisingly versatile, given the right... perspective.
Belts... you'd be surprised by how versatile they are, given the right perspective.
I'll admit... I never quite understood the human obsession with footwear. Shoes exist to protect the feet. Nothing more.
I don't quite understand the human fixation with shoes and footwear. They exist to protect the feet. Anything else is unnecessary.
I doubt that armor would do much to protect you, anyways.
The usefulness of that armor seems... questionable. Especially on a modern battlefield.
What kind of armor is that, anyways... it seems more than a bit questionable.
You armor yourself with that?
Boots, hm? Simple and practical... in most cases.
Boots... durable and practical. In most cases, anyways.
Boots. Nice, simple, and durable... usually.
The gloves are coming off, hm?
I see the gloves are coming off.
How do you say it... ah. The gloves are coming off, hm?
Ribbons, frills... all liable to get caught or entangled, on the battlefield.
Ribbons? Seems a bit... childish, honestly.
Sandals? Why not wear close-toed shoes? Wouldn't they be more protective?
Why do you wear sandals? Wouldn't close-toed shoes offer better protection from things on the ground and the elements?
Interesting. You're taking the stockings off separately?
Wait, I was under the impression that shoes and stockings had to come off together...
Oh. We're allowed to take stockings off separately from shoes?
Ah, so you're an electronic warfare platform, like UMP45. But your only backup weapons are melee weapons? At the very least, 45 has her SMG to rely on...
A heavy machine gun... interesting choice. I prefer something more precise, myself.
Hm? Why am I suddenly getting simulation error warnings...?
In any case, it's none of my concern. If that... ghost artillery tries to lay fire on me, however, I will have to take action, Shimakaze.
An AI wired into a warship's systems, perhaps...?
On the other hand, I don't think that's slowed you down at all.
(Shimakaze, this is Hotel-Kilo-Four-One-Six, radio check, over.)
You may still be able to salvage something, from this engagement.
Then again, if your repair bays are anything like IOP's, you'll be fine. Those devices are almost magical in their thoroughness.
Really, given how often our clothes get torn and ripped due to battlefield damage, I'd say it's almost like they were... designed... to do that...
To keep fighting even through all that enemy fire... I'll admit, her tenacity is respectable. Admirable, even.
Wait, how did you... No, that's irrelevant. Who, or what exactly are you, Miss Yurelia?
That was no meretechnical malfunction! Are you insane?!
You can make of that what you will... but, at least in my case, I know it's accurate.
(...She doesn't appear to be focused at all.) Well, whatever...

There are no excuses for being careless or negligent during an engagement.
Not even during something like this.
You could've gotten us all killed with that mistake, and that's all you have to say about it? Absolute brainlet...
Of course, if you're here just to bitch at us for the entire engagement, I would suggest saving your breath.
It must hurt, having your crutches kicked out from under you... hm?
And... for that matter, how much of an absolute brainlet do you have to be to use your actual name in a fake identity?

I-I see. Most humans I've met just think we're soulless killing machines. It's... quite rare to find anyone who thinks otherwise.
I-I wasn't concerned, though. I was just curious about your thoughts.
The gloves are coming off, hm?
I see the gloves are coming off.
How do you say it... ah. The gloves are coming off, hm?
Is that so... I've heard rumors of man-portable flight units, but I've never seen one in-person before. Well, Except for that one time in Prague...
War and conflict are truly universal... which I suppose is fortunate for me, hm?
It certainly looked advanced, in any case... but I'd much rather try to avoid getting hit at all.
Nonetheless... High-tech armor or not, I'd much rather not get hit at all.
Maybe it's classified or experimental tech...?
Your loss.
Well... the armor is your decision to make and your loss, I suppose.
Certainly not the armor I would choose... but I try not to get hit in the first place.
It's definitely not what I would choose... though I try not to get damaged at all.
I hope you put up more of a fight.
Nonetheless... I relish a good challenge.
I look forward to any further challenges you may put up.
